medical_history.chief_complaint: Nausea and vomiting for 3 days after eating, with recent jaundice.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms of nausea and vomiting started 3 days ago after eating. They continued with increasing severity over the first 48 hours. The patient became jaundiced last night, with darkening of urine noted this morning. The patient also describes emesis related to recent oral intake. There was an episode of epigastric pain approximately 1 month ago after eating sausage.
